name: FirstQuadrant
headline: Accelerate progress with infinitely scalable AI sales
description: Turn B2B sales into a fully scalable and fully autonomous system with artificial intelligence. FirstQuadrant encompasses a complete suite of AI tools for inbound, outbound, and nurturing sales, ensuring a unified approach to relationship management.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:sales; industry:sales-enablement; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Carlo Badini, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Co-founder at FirstQuadrdant. Prior to FirstQuadrant, Carlo founded a Swiss design agency at the age of 20 and bootstrapped it to 40 employees and multiple millions in revenue. He has been recognised by EY Entrepreneur of the Year and Forbes 30 Under 30.

founders.name: Anand Chowdhary, Founder/CTO/CPO
founders.description: Co-founder, CTO, CPO at FirstQuadrant. Previously founded rent-to-own furniture brand Pabio, accessibility tech startup Oswald Labs, and fashion ecommerce company Melangebox. Top open-source contributor, listed as a GitHub Star and in Forbes 30 Under 30.

generated_description:
**FirstQuadrant: The Future of Scalable AI Sales**

Founded in 2020 and incubated in Y Combinator's Summer 2021 batch, FirstQuadrant is a San Francisco-based startup on a mission to revolutionize B2B sales through artificial intelligence. With just a two-person team (including Group Partner Nan), they’ve developed a powerful suite of tools designed to convert traditional sales processes into fully autonomous systems.

At its core, FirstQuadrant provides a unified platform for inbound, outbound, and nurturing sales processes. This means companies can leverage their tools to streamline how they connect with leads—automatically sourcing and enriching potential clients, sending personalized messages, and engaging through conversations that feel less robotic and more human. Imagine if your sales team could book meetings with prospects without constant manual intervention—that's what they claim to deliver.

The platform tackles common sales challenges like lead sourcing, email deliverability, and engagement, employing advanced features such as smart scheduling and dynamic follow-ups. It's equipped to ensure your outreach reaches the right people at the right time, all while maintaining message integrity and avoid spam filters.

One of the standout aspects of FirstQuadrant is their emphasis on analytics and reporting. Users can track the effectiveness of their sales strategies in real-time—adjusting tactics based on what works best. They also offer support for unlimited users, ensuring that teams can collaborate freely without being constrained by user limits, and they’ve designed their interface to be responsive and user-friendly.

FirstQuadrant already counts some of the fastest-growing startups among its customers, helping them automate their sales processes and scale exponentially. Notable testimonials underscore the ease and effectiveness of using their platform; one founder marvels at the increase in booked meetings after integrating FirstQuadrant’s solutions. 

If you’re looking to elevate your sales game with AI, FirstQuadrant is worth exploring. Visit their website at [firstquadrant.ai](https://firstquadrant.ai) for more information, including how to apply for access to their platform. As the AI landscape evolves, FirstQuadrant is positioning itself as a key player in making sales more efficient, effective, and human-centric.
